entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Version conflict during compilation #57882
    area-System.Text.Json, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add method TryFormat for Enum #57881
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Logging Source Generator fails to compile due to CS8795 error with file-scoped namespaces #57880
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Task.Delay 100x slower on mono than coreclr on macOS #57877
    tenet-performance, untriaged, area-Threading-mono
  • profiler/multiple/multiple/multiple.sh #57875
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-linux, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, untriaged

Closed

  • DataContractJsonSerializer can't serialize contract with ExtensionDataObject #55270
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • OpenSSL 3.0 has removed `ERR_GET_FUNC` #57674
    area-System.Security, blocking-release, os-linux, 6.0.0

Updated

  • Further reduce Linq usage in ComponentModel.Annotations #57897
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, untriaged
  • Possible .NET optimization opportunities for an accumulated multiply-add loop #56855
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, optimization, Priority:2, 7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json support to System.Runtime.Serialization #29975
    area-System.Text.Json, Future
  • [API Proposal]: RegexOptions.Constrained #57891
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, api-ready-for-review, 7.0.0
  • SocketException: An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host. .net core #57895
    area-System.Net, untriaged
  • [API Proposal]: Add a GetDebuggerDisplay() to Object #57887
    api-suggestion, area-System.Runtime, untriaged
  • Getting rid of ImmutableArray<T>.IsDefault ? #26829
    area-System.Collections, Future
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-103298-.NET7 #57892
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, .NET 6, validation-runtime-.NET 6, runtime #runtime-101520-.NET6 #57259
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 RC 1, validation-runtime-.NET 6 RC 1 #runtime-102558-.NET6RC1 #57711
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • User Story: .NET 7.0 developers can verify more APIs for correct usage to speed up their development #57797
    area-Meta, User Story, Priority:2, Cost:L, Bottom Up Work, Team:Libraries, 7.0.0
  • [HTTP/2] Race between reading response and reset? #57617
    bug, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Hang when reading response data #57888
    area-System.Net.Http, untriaged
  • Http server performance regression in net6 preview 7 #57656
    area-System.Net.Http, needs more info, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • Support Unicode Script character classes in regular expressions #57038
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, up-for-grabs, feature request, Future
  • JIT: Assertion failed '(constIndOffset % elemSize) == 0' #57856
    arch-arm32, disabled-test, os-linux, JitStress, area-CodeGen-coreclr, untriaged
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'false' in src/coreclr/jit/earlyprop.cpp Line: 199 #57774
    disabled-test, os-linux, JitStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Test failure:Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_34094\\Test34094\\Test34094.cmd #57458
    arch-x86, disabled-test, os-linux, os-windows, JitStress, arch-x64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs further triage, in pr, 7.0.0
  • Maybe spin-waits in the thread pool can be tuned better for arm/arm64 #39559
    arch-arm64, area-System.Threading, in pr, 7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Change behaviour of Setting SymmetricAlgorithm.KeySize (Or add documentation) #57859
    documentation, area-System.Security, untriaged
  • [mono] Implement Environment.GetFolderPath for Android #35490
    blocking-release, os-android, area-CoreLib-mono, 6.0.0
  • Enum.ToString is slower than explicit implementation #57748
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, untriaged
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize is intolerably slow in Blazor WebAssembly, but very fast in .NET Core integration test #40386
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • SerialPort error on Virtual Serial Port for USB #30877
    area-System.IO, os-windows, up-for-grabs, Future
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main runtime, .NET 7, validation-runtime-.NET 7 #runtime-102478-.NET7 #57710
    area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Regions] pCorProfilerInfo->GetObjectGeneration may fail when running under USE_REGIONS #55965
    area-GC-coreclr, in pr, 7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Request fewer threads in the thread pool #57885
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57884
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57883
    area-Serialization
  • [release/6.0] Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57879
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Stabilize runtime-coreclr pipelines (round 1) #57788
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Align DCJS with 4.8 implementation. #57533
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Stop using ERR_GET_FUNC, since it has been removed in OSSL3 Beta2. #57869
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57864
    area-System.Threading
  • Disable TaskDropsExecutionContextUponCompletion test #57863
    area-System.Threading
  • Remove IsZapped and GetZappedModule functions #57823
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Replace Microsoft.DotNet.PackageValidation with Microsoft.DotNet.Compatibility Package #57783

Updated

  • Handle file-scoped namespaces in Logging Source Generator #57894
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Propagate BBF flags during hoisting #57825
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix `StringSegment.Buffer` can be null #57858
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Primitives
  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Replace constant strings with SyntaxKind #57898
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Nullable annotation for System.Windows.Extensions #57896
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and AOT after publish #57556
    arch-wasm
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add event to RuntimeEventSource for AppContext switches #57847
  • Remove stray #nullable disable from SkipLocalsInit.cs #57889
  • MonoAOTCompiler: Check for proxy file's target only when the cache is… #57865
    area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #57854
    community-contribution
  • handle special error event #57804
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog, community-contribution
  • Remove more ngen-related dead code and config vars #57874
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Remove ZapSig::EncodeField as it is unused. #57845
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement NativeLibrary.GetEntryPointModuleHandle #57610
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix GetGenerationBounds under USE_REGIONS #57101
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Remove PlainPointer, RelativePointer and RelativeFixupPointer #57707
    area-CrossGen/NGEN-coreclr

Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can not reference RCL assets using assembly name #35587
  • Web.config transformations not working when deploying Blazor WebAssembly application to Production and Staging Environments #35584
  • Blazor: InputFile out of memory #35583
    area-blazor, Needs: Attention :wave:
  • VS 2022 Preview 3.1 Template creates Minimal API for Blazor Server Hosted Project #35577
    area-runtime

Closed

  • Pack of .NET 5 RazorClassLibrary is broken when .NET 6 Preview 7 is installed #35568
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-static-web-assets
  • RedirectToAction should support relative paths #33568
    area-mvc, Needs: Attention :wave:, Discussions
  • Autorebuild & refresh browser doesn't work for F# projects #35543
    area-mvc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, feature-hot-reload
  • .Net 6 Preview 7 sdk is adversely affecting npm commands #35541
    question, area-blazor, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, feature-razor-sdk
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35478
    area-runtime, api-ready-for-review, feature-minimal-actions, 6.0-rc1
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly TaskCancelledException during retry when deadline is hit. #28383
    bug, area-runtime, feature-httpclientfactory, area-grpc, :heavy_check_mark: Resolution: Answered, Status: Resolved, Next sprint planning
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types & body schema/shape #35082
    area-mvc, api-approved, feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1

Updated

  • Uint8Array created by byte[] deserialization in javascript has incorrect buffer property byteLength #35597
  • Throws MessagePack.MessagePackSerializationException when simultaneously sending same message to multiple connected clients #35595
  • Return the path in error handling #35596
  • Model binding fails with FormatException if dictionary key is numeric type and value is missing from POST #35594
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:
  • Html.ActionLink() returns incorrect URL when Minimal Action with Name metadata in use #35592
  • dev-certificates on Linux -- how to get dotnet-to-dotnet comms to work? #7246
    enhancement, area-commandlinetools, feature-devcerts, severity-major, affected-medium, Backlog
  • Error in .NET 6 SDK when building a Blazor Wasm project that transitive referencing a Razor Class Library package built by .NET 5 SDK that contains static web assets #35590
  • Subclassing Startup from StartupBase throws NotSupportedException #35502
    Docs, area-runtime, feature-hosting
  • [SignalR] Provide a way for Azure SignalR to read HttpConnectionDispatcherOptions #35544
    area-signalr
  • Blazor Hosted WebAssembly, Failing to resolve the route. #35589
  • Analyzers for Minimal APIs #35528
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • asp.netcore cpu throttle in k8s cluster #29150
    area-runtime, Needs: Attention :wave:, Next sprint planning
  • Support Blazor properly for All ASP.Net Identity Scaffolded pages (i.e., not Razor Pages) #35551
    area-blazor
  • Autogenerated code can't compile in VS preview version. #35554
    Author: Migration Bot :robot:, area-razor.compiler
  • enpoints.MapRazorPages() throwing an exception. #35365
    Needs: Author Feedback, area-mvc
  • Support custom error messages for optionality via nullability feature #35501
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Publish nightly builds to an LKG location #35457
    area-infrastructure, .NET 7-Candidate
  • What to do with Microsoft.Extensions.DiagnosticAdapter dependency #35463
    area-infrastructure
  • So, how do we manage Sessions in ASP.NET Core in 2021? #33686
    Docs, area-runtime, Discussions
  • Create 6.0 SiteExtensions package #35430
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • VS is slow to start making requests of Language Servers #31416
    External, investigate, blocked, area-razor.tooling, feature-razor.vs, feature-razor.textmate, 17.0-Preview4

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge from 'release/6.0-rc1' into 'release/6.0' #35588
  • Update Components to use LoggerMessage #35585
    area-blazor
  • Include source in RequestDelegateFactory missing required parameter log #35580
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Remove null check for HttpContext #35581
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore dotnet/runtime #35573
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35578
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 (#35230) #35579
    Servicing-approved, 6.0-rc1
  • Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35570
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Improve Minimal APIs support for request media types #35082 #35230
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35539
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • RC1 Port: Add FailureReasons (#35425) #35529
    area-security, ask-mode
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/runtime dotnet/efcore #35547
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [release/6.0] Update dependencies from dotnet/efcore #35593
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35591
    area-runtime
  • [release/3.1] Expose all references when not restoring #33197
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.17
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Minimal APIs naming cleanup #35576
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add support for Results extension point #35574
    area-runtime
  • Add support for Results extension point #35571
    area-runtime
  • Update middleware that assumes UseRouting is called after them, for minimal hosting #35426
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • Don't cache CanReuse value #35575
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0-rc1] HTTP/3: Response drain timeout #35492
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, ask-mode, 6.0-rc1
  • Add Support for `DateOnly` & `TimeOnly` for `SupplyParameterFromQuery` #35569
    area-blazor

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Adding views in HR does not respect index and appends #2198
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] LayoutOptions not respected in Hot Reload #2197
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] [HotReload] Removing all or the last view in a layout does not refresh the tree #2196
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Bug] FilePicker throws COMException on Windows #2194

Closed

  • [Bug] Can't run Maui.WinUI #2113
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [Bug] Can't AddScoped HttpClient WinUI Maui-Blazor #2193

Updated

  • [Bug] Typing in an entry sets the cursor position to 0 after each character #2201
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • WebView needs Width and Height for Filling screen #2203
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor is not applied if changed using a binding or in code at runtime #1854
    t/bug
  • [Bug] BackgroundColor doesn't update when applied to Page #2152
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • Button not rendered correctly #1941
    t/bug
  • [Bug] Setting ScrollbarVisibility in ScrollView is not working #2202
  • [Bug] [Android] Empty or Null HTML Label throws exception #2199
  • [Bug] Changing Grid RowDefinition or ColumnDefinition's Width or Height does not update layout. #2121
    partner, partner/ui-tools, 6.0.100-rc.1
  • AbsoluteLayout for MAUI #2192
  • [Bug] Connection refused when calling ASP.NET Core API endpoints from .NET MAUI Blazor App #1707
    area/blazor 🕸️

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SkiaSharp and add pdb files #2195

Updated

  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-macios #2184
  • [main] Update dependencies from xamarin/xamarin-android #2183
  • Fix some Layout update bugs #2200
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • Avoid scanning obj directory with wildcard includes #2180

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • HasDefaultValue(constant) #25648
    customer-reported
  • "Possible null reference return" in auto-generated compiled model #25647
    customer-reported
  • Unexcepted result when use .Contains() in .Where() #25644
    customer-reported

Closed

  • ISO Dates are malfunctioning #25646
    closed-question, customer-reported

Updated

  • Detect unknown shadow primary key values when attempting to save owned collection #19856
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, area-change-tracking, punted-for-5.0, 6.0.0
  • Recursive Hierarchy in self referenced table - ef core 5 #25649
    customer-reported
  • Allow users to check connection string used by database update operation #15689
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, good first issue, consider-for-next-release, Backlog
  • Can't explicit load many-to-many relationships. #24329
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query
  • Improve exception message for projection with JSON field conversion #21602
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-query
  • Column 'x' is invalid in the select list because it is not contained in either an aggregate function or the GROUP BY clause.' #21036
    type-bug, customer-reported, verify-fixed, area-query, 6.0.0
  • Dependency issues between visitors #20445

    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2

    type-bug, area-perf, closed-fixed, area-model-building, 6.0.0-rc2

  • Query: Better pattern match to add code to join fetch entity when inc… #25636
